description: Daniel B√©dard Drums How about a groovy version of "Chega De Saudade"? Check out this smooth version of this classic Jobim piece played by Steve Gadd on drums and Larry Goldings on organ. I really love how Gadd plays the samba on the drumset whether it is with Chick Corea or here. Such a great feel!  Check out more drumming videos right here:  www.facebook.com/danielbedarddrums/videos
